com.seagate.kinetic.example.heartbeat

Class SampleHeartbeatListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seagate.kinetic.simulator.monitor.HeartbeatListener
      • com.seagate.kinetic.example.heartbeat.SampleHeartbeatListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class SampleHeartbeatListener
extends com.seagate.kinetic.simulator.monitor.HeartbeatListener
    A simple Kinetic Heartbeat listener example.

    A Kinetic heart beat message is a JSON formated string message (UTF-8) published by a Kinetic drive or simulator.

    The HeartbeatListener is an utility that listens on the specified heart beat address. The HeartbeatListener.onMessage(byte[]) is invoked when a heartbeat message is received.

    Applications may extend the HeartbeatListener and override its onMessage() method to receive the heart beat messages.

    Author:
    chiaming
